checks.name: notebook_root_access
checks.title: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have root access disabled
checks.risk: Users with root access have administrator privileges. Users can access and edit all files on a notebook instance with root access enabled.

remediation.text: Set the RootAccess field to Disabled. You can also disable root access for users when you create or update a notebook instance in the Amazon SageMaker console.
